job_history.work_description: Monitor the financial system of Grant Answers by using Turbo Cash and Microsoft Excel. Assist with the arrangement of the budget. Prepare income statements and balance sheets. Maintained integrity of general ledger, including the chart of accounts. Optimized and managed research and development spending through collaboration with key business leaders.

Process customer transactions while engaging in conversation in order to provide pleasing customer service and to detect possible fraud. Inform customers about our products that may suit their needs as well as cross-sell bank products and services. Manage the bank's vault to verify balances. Resolve discrepancies in accounts while assuring comfort to our customers.

Trained and supervised seasonal employees on job function, company's policies/procedures. Determined customers' needs by interacting with them and provided suggestions and alternatives. Helped customers with questions, problems and complaints in person and via telephone. Organized racks and shelves to maintain the visual appeal of the store. Stocked and replenished merchandise according to store merchandising layouts.

Utilized effective interpersonal skills to meet the needs of customers. Processed shipment deliveries and restocked clothing and accessories. Organized, displayed and processed thorough knowledge regarding the merchandised offered for sale.

Provided administrative and executive services in order to make sure everything operated smoothly for the senators and the executive board by managing the calendar/agenda, by preparing reports and spreadsheets. Spoke on behalf of the student body and interacted with many students in order to make decisions that will benefit the majority.

Committed to community services with free financial literacy seminars to improve low income communities by educating teenagers and homeless parents. Volunteered at soup kitchens, community clean up and at schools.
Participate in various activities helping children by painting elementary schools for motivation and writing letters to Santa Claus during the holiday season.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Monitored financial system using Turbo Cash and Microsoft Excel, prepared income statements and balance sheets, and optimized research and development spending, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Assisted with budget arrangement, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Used extensively for managing financial records and preparing reports, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided pleasing customer service as a teller and sales associate, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Trained and supervised seasonal employees, and spoke on behalf of the student body as a secretary/senator, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Utilized effective interpersonal skills to meet customer needs, and interacted with many students to make decisions, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed calendar/agenda, prepared reports and spreadsheets, and organized racks and shelves, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Community Service
skills.explanation: Committed to community services with free financial literacy seminars, volunteered at soup kitchens, and participated in various activities helping children, indicating some practical experience.
